AboutPage.title: About ArmenianCoin
AboutPage.subtitle: "With heart, soul and by the law"
AboutPage.description: ArmenianCoin represents more than cryptocurrency—it's a movement uniting Armenians worldwide to support children and families from Artsakh and those in need throughout Armenia.
AboutPage.missionDescription: 10% of all funds go directly to verified charity support for those in need
AboutPage.why1: The Armenian diaspora spans the globe, but our hearts remain connected to our homeland. ArmenianCoin bridges this distance, creating a direct pathway for Armenians worldwide to support families and children in Armenia, especially those from Artsakh who face ongoing challenges.
AboutPage.why2: Through blockchain technology, we ensure every contribution is transparent, verified, and reaches those who need it most. This isn't just about cryptocurrency—it's about preserving our values of family, community, and helping those in need.
AboutPage.why3: Our slogan "With heart, soul and by the law" reflects our commitment to operating with genuine compassion while maintaining complete legal compliance and transparency.
AboutPage.coreValuesSubtitle: Built on the foundation of Armenian heritage and guided by principles that have sustained our people through centuries.
AboutPage.heartSoulDesc: Every action we take comes from genuine compassion. We support Artsakh families and Armenian children with unwavering dedication, treating each contribution as a sacred trust from our global community.
AboutPage.globalUnityDesc: Our diaspora's strength lies in unity. Armenians from Los Angeles to Paris, from Buenos Aires to Sydney, all connected by shared purpose and cultural pride, working together to support our homeland.
AboutPage.byLawDesc: Complete transparency and legal compliance guide everything we do. Every charitable contribution is verified, tracked, and reported, ensuring maximum impact and maintaining the trust our community places in us.
AboutPage.howItWorksSubtitle: A transparent, blockchain-powered system that connects global Armenian support directly to families and children in need.
AboutPage.step1Desc: Buy ArmenianCoin tokens through our secure platform using MetaMask or other Ethereum wallets.
AboutPage.step2Desc: 10% of all funds are automatically allocated to our verified charity support program.
AboutPage.step3Desc: Funds go directly to verified families and children from Artsakh and throughout Armenia.
AboutPage.step4Desc: View detailed reports on how funds are used and the impact made in our community.
AboutPage.commitmentSubtitle: We pledge to operate with the highest standards of integrity, transparency, and compassion.
